thread.title: Luis Enrique hits out at Barcelona fans for jeers | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Luis Enrique hits out at Barcelona fans for jeers | Daily Mail Online

author: James Dutton For Mailonline
title: Luis Enrique hits out at Barcelona fans for jeers | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Lionel Messi spared Barcelona's blushes against Leganes, but it was not enough to please the home fans who jeered their own team at the Nou Camp. The Argentine star scored both goals, including a 90th minute penalty, as Barca struggled against modest opposition in front of their own fans. The uninspiring performance did little to assuage the fears of their supporters as the fallout continues from their 4-0 hammering by Paris Saint-Germain in the Champions League in midweek. Luis Enrique urges his team on during their 2-1 win over Leganes on Sunday night The Barcelona coach hit out at the home fans for their jeers and whistles during the game Though Messi had given his side the perfect start by opening the scoring after four minutes, they failed to kick on and were brought level when Unai Lopez found the back of the net in second-half. Messi redeemed his side in the end, but it still left boss Luis Enrique defending his stuttering stars after the game. RELATED ARTICLES
